rules_text:
When Bushtail Farseer enters the battlefield, traverse Kahembo. [i](Planeswalk to Kahembo. If you're already there, cause {A}.)[/i]
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Bushtail Farseer gets +4/+4 and gains flying and trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: [i]“I've always dreamed of being a flying squirrel. I hear the academy makes dreams come true!”[/i]
